game_description: Welcome to the global VR tournament. Here you control soccer teams of special non-human players to complete various challenges. Tactical and fast-paced, this game is designed to be the arena of competition for VR players all over the world! At the start of each challenge, huge balls fall from above. Score them into the goal as fast as you can! Your players kick the balls, attract the balls, shoot at the balls, explode the bombs near the balls and much more. There are a total of 18 player abilities in the game. Each challenge has a unique combination of them. Make smart decisions and act really fast to get the most out of your team! After successful games, your global rating is updated. For example, you can be in the top 57% or the top 9% of all players around the world.
Languages: English, French (France), German, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Spain)
